item.title: Venom: The Last Dance Box Office Officially Passes Sony's Oscar-Winning 2018 Marvel Movie's Entire Gross In Just 3 Weeks
item.description: Venom: The Last Dance already passed many superhero movies at the box office, like The Marvels and Morbius, and the film now beats an Oscar winner.

item.title: The Amateur's James Hawes & Rami Malek Talk New Spy Thriller And Slow Horses & '70s Genre Influences
item.description: The Amateur director James Hawes & star Rami Malek share some insight for the spy thriller alongside the trailer's release and their genre influences.
